title: Add gitpro sync operation for safe remote fast-forward
Add Python vs TypeScript intelligence to sync logic
description:
Enhance sync-starter-kit to detect project language (Python vs TypeScript) and pull appropriate configurations.

## Context
- Pull Python configs from ~/projects/dax as reference implementation
- sync-starter-kit currently handles TypeScript projects
- Need language detection and conditional config pulling

## Tasks
- [ ] Add language detection (package.json vs pyproject.toml/setup.py)
- [ ] Create Python config templates based on dax patterns
- [ ] Update sync logic to conditionally apply configs
- [ ] Handle mixed-language projects

title: pre-gitpro: add Python type checking gate
description: Add pyright/ruff check to pre-gitpro.sh for Python projects. Equivalent to npm run check-types for TypeScript â€” catch compile-level errors only, keep it fast.

title: gitpro merge: skip version bump when no package.json/pyproject.toml
